page.title: 08Shops of the 80s
page.content: Shops in 1985 are very different from those of years ago.Instead of going into the shop and asking for what you want all you need to do is go to the local supermarket where,under one roof you can buy all the things you need.It doesn't matter what the weather is like because if it is hot or cold the air conditioning will keep you cool or warm.Locally there at least 5 supermarkets and a very big hypermarket,Sava-Centre,in Oldbury.There, you can find everything from clothes and shoes to fresh foods or electrical goods.The shop is said to be larger than West Bromwich football ground.There is room for 5000 cars on the car park and there is even a petrol station if you run out of petrol.
